attributes.action: Raise the age for riders using mopeds and quad bikes to 18 or maybe 19yrs and get idiots off the road that only like to throw eggs at windows
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that the Government should raise the age limit from 16 to 18 to stop school kids riding scooters and causing a menace on roads, and this goes for quad bikes too,
And also raise the restriction of CC size on motorbikes that a full car license holder has
To 125cc what good is a 49cc moped on the hills we have, many people have got full driving licenses, it too much trouble to put in for a new test to ride bigger bikes and I would ride a big scooter in summer to save fuel and we can all have a lot of fun at the same time
